patternSteps.1: Ready Posture: Warrior Ready Stance B
patternSteps.2: Step 1. Move the left foot to B to form a sitting stance toward D while extending both elbows to the sides horizontally.
patternSteps.3: Step 2. Execute an angle punch to C with the left fist while sliding to A, maintaining a sitting stance toward D.
patternSteps.4: Step 3. Execute an angle punch to C with the right fist while sliding to B, maintaining a sitting stance toward D. Perform 2 and 3 in a fast motion.
patternSteps.5: Step 4. Execute a middle hooking block to D with the right palm while standing up toward D.
patternSteps.6: Step 5. Execute a middle punch to D with the left fist while forming a sitting stance toward D.
patternSteps.7: Step 6. Execute a middle hooking block to D with the left palm while standing up toward D.
patternSteps.8: Step 7. Execute a middle punch to D with the right fist while forming a sitting stance toward D.
patternSteps.9: Step 8. Move the left foot to BD to form a left walking stance toward BD while executing a high side block to BD with the left outer forearm.
patternSteps.10: Step 9. Execute a circular block to D with the right inner forearm while maintaining a left walking stance toward BD.
patternSteps.11: Step 10. Execute a scooping block with the left palm while forming a sitting stance toward AD.
patternSteps.12: Step 11. Execute a middle punch to AD with the right fist while maintaining a sitting stance toward AD. Perform 10 and 11 in a connecting motion.
patternSteps.13: Step 12. Bring the left foot to the right foot, and then move the right foot to AD to form a right walking stance toward AD while executing a high side block to AD with the right outer forearm.
patternSteps.14: Step 13. Execute a circular block to D with the left inner forearm while maintaining a right walking stance toward AD.
patternSteps.15: Step 14. Execute a scooping block with the right palm while forming a sitting stance toward BD.
patternSteps.16: Step 15. Execute a middle punch to BD with the left fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward BD. Perform 14 and 15 in a connecting motion.
patternSteps.17: Step 16. Execute a high hooking block to BC with the right palm while forming a left walking stance toward BC.
patternSteps.18: Step 17. Execute a middle punch to BD with the left fist while forming a sitting stance toward BD.
patternSteps.19: Step 18. Execute a high hooking block to AD with the left palm while forming a right walking stance toward AD.
patternSteps.20: Step 19. Execute a middle punch to BD with the right fist while forming sitting stance toward BD. Perform 16, 17, 18 and 19 in a continuous motion.
patternSteps.21: Step 20. Move the right foot to C, forming a left walking stance toward D at the same time executing a pressing block with an X-fist.
patternSteps.22: Step 21. Execute a rising block with an X-knife-hand while maintaining a left walking stance toward D. Perform 20 and 21 in a continuous motion.
patternSteps.23: Step 22. Execute a middle punch to D with the right fist, slipping the left palm up to the right elbow joint while maintaining a left walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.24: Step 23. Execute a low front snap kick to D with the right foot, keeping the position of the hands as they were in 22.
patternSteps.25: Step 24. Lower the right foot to D, forming a right walking stance toward D while executing a middle punch to D with the left fist.
patternSteps.26: Step 25. Execute a pressing block with an X-fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.27: Step 26. Execute a rising block with an X-knife-hand while maintaining a right walking stance toward D. Perform 25 and 26 in a continuous motion.
patternSteps.28: Step 27. Execute a middle punch to D with the left fist slipping the right palm up to the left elbow joint while maintaining a right walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.29: Step 28. Execute a low front snap kick to D with the left foot, keeping the position of the hands as they were in 27.
patternSteps.30: Step 29. Lower the left foot to D to form a left walking stance toward D while executing a middle punch to D with the right fist.
patternSteps.31: Step 30. Move the right foot to D, forming a left L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.32: Step 31. Move the left foot to D to form a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.33: Step 32. Move the left foot to C, forming a left L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.34: Step 33. Move the right foot to C to form a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.35: Step 34. Move the right foot to D, forming a right walking stance toward D while executing a high block to D with the right double forearm.
patternSteps.36: Step 35. Execute a low block to D with the left forearm, keeping the right forearm as it was in 34 while maintaining a right walking stance toward D. Perform 34 and 35 in a fast motion.
patternSteps.37: Step 36. Move the left foot to D to form a left walking stance toward D while executing a high block to D with the left double forearm.
patternSteps.38: Step 37. Execute a low block to D with the right forearm, keeping the left forearm as it was in 36 while maintaining a left walking stance toward D. Perform 36 and 37 in a fast motion.
patternSteps.39: Step 38. Move the right foot to D, forming aright walking stance toward D while executing a middle punch to D with the right fist.
patternSteps.40: Step 39. Move the left foot on line CD, and then turn counter-clockwise, pivoting with the left foot to form a right L-stance toward C while executing a high block to C with the left reverse knife-hand.
patternSteps.41: Step 40. Bring the right foot to the left foot to form a closed ready stance C toward C.
patternSteps.42: Step 41. Move the right foot to CF in a stamping motion to form a right walking stance toward CF at the same time executing an upset punch to CF with a twin fist.
patternSteps.43: Step 42. Bring the right foot to the left foot, and then move the left foot to CE in a stamping motion, forming a left walking stance toward CE while executing an upset punch to CE with a twin fist.
patternSteps.44: Step 43. Bring the left foot to the right foot, and then move the right foot to F to form a left L-stance toward F while executing a middle block to F with the right inner forearm.
patternSteps.45: Step 44. Execute a middle punch to F with the left fist while maintaining a left L-stance toward F.
patternSteps.46: Step 45. Bring the left foot to the right foot to form a closed stance toward C while executing an angle punch with the right fist. Perform in a slow motion.
patternSteps.47: Step 46. Move the left foot to E to form a right L-stance toward E while executing a middle block to E with the left inner forearm.
patternSteps.48: Step 47. Execute a middle punch to E with the right fist while maintaining a right L-stance toward E.
patternSteps.49: Step 48. Bring the right foot to the left foot to form a close stance toward C while executing an angle punch with the left fist. Perform in a slow motion.
patternSteps.50: Step 49. Move the left foot to E to form a left fixed stance toward E while executing a U-shape punch to E.
patternSteps.51: Step 50. Bring the left foot to the right foot, and then move the right foot to E, forming a right fixed stance toward E while executing a U-shape punch to E.
patternSteps.52: Step 51. Move the right foot on line CD in a stamping motion to form a sitting stance toward E while executing a front strike to E with the right back fist.
patternSteps.53: Step 52. Execute a waving kick to D with the right foot, and then a high outward block to AC with the right outer forearm, keeping the position of the hands as they were in 51 while forming a sitting stance toward E.
patternSteps.54: Step 53. Execute a waving kick to C with the left foot, and then a high front block to ED with the right outer forearm, keeping the position of the hands as they were in 52 while forming a sitting stance toward E.
patternSteps.55: Step 54. Execute a horizontal strike to C with the right back hand while maintaining a sitting stance toward E.
patternSteps.56: Step 55. Execute a middle crescent kick to the right palm with the left foot.
patternSteps.57: Step 56. Execute a middle side piercing kick to C with the left foot forming a forearm guarding block. Perform 55 and 56 in a consecutive kick.
patternSteps.58: Step 57. Lower the left foot to C to form a sitting stance toward B while executing a horizontal strike to C with the left back hand.
patternSteps.59: Step 58. Execute a middle crescent kick to the left palm with the right foot.
patternSteps.60: Step 59. Execute a middle side piercing kick to C with the right foot, forming a forearm guarding block. Perform 58 and 59 in a consecutive kick.
patternSteps.61: Step 60. Lower the right foot to C, forming a sitting stance toward A while executing a right 9-shape block.
patternSteps.62: Step 61. Change the position of the hands while maintaining a sitting stance toward A.
patternSteps.63: Step 62. Move the left foot to C, turning clockwise to form a sitting stance toward B while executing a right 9-shape block.
patternSteps.64: Step 63. Change the position of the hands while maintaining a sitting stance toward B.
patternSteps.65: Step 64. Execute a downward strike to D with the right side fist while forming a left vertical stance toward, pulling the left foot.
patternSteps.66: Step 65. Move the right foot to A to form a left walking stance toward B while executing a high vertical punch to B with a twin fist.
patternSteps.67: Step 66. Move the right foot to B, turning counter-clockwise to form a left walking stance toward A while executing a high vertical punch to A with a twin fist.
patternSteps.68: Step 67. Bring the right foot to the left foot, and ten move the left foot to BD to form a right L-stance toward BD while executing a middle guarding block to BD with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.69: Step 68. Bring the left foot to the right foot, and then move the right foot to AD to form a left L-stance toward AD while executing a middle guarding block to AD with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.70: End: Bring the foot back to a ready position
